entry.title: Combined summary - Eltoo in a tree
entry.summary: The email discusses the concept of channel factories, which are a type of cryptocurrency system. It references the Burchert-Decker-Wattenhofer Channel Factories and the Fulgurite discussion. The email suggests that channel factories will be created after Decker-Russell-Osuntokun ("eltoo") is online, which requires a `SIGHASH_NOINPUT`. Furthermore, the email provides a hierarchy of types for cryptocurrency systems that includes blockchain and offchain cryptocurrency systems. The Decker-Wattenhofer system is mentioned as a multiparty option that requires long locktimes on unilateral, while Decker-Russell-Osuntokun is a multiparty option that requires short locktimes on unilateral. Finally, the email concludes by stating that the NOctaHub is another offchain cryptocurrency system that allows for nesting other offchain cryptocurrency systems inside it, similar to how Burchert-Decker-Wattenhofer channels work. Along with this, the context mentions an optimization idea for Eltoo discussed in a forum post on bitcointalk.org. However, the link to the post is broken and cannot be accessed. The non-text attachment called "signature.asc" is likely a digital signature that confirms the authenticity of the message being sent.
